scripts.rust:build-nodejs: rimraf ./rust/pkg && cd rust; wasm-pack build --target=nodejs; wasm-opt pkg/cardano_serialization_lib_bg.wasm -o pkg/cardano_serialization_lib_bg.wasm -O --enable-mutable-globals; wasm-pack pack; cd .. && npm run js:flowgen
scripts.rust:build-browser: rimraf ./rust/pkg && cd rust; wasm-pack build --target=browser; wasm-opt pkg/cardano_serialization_lib_bg.wasm -o pkg/cardano_serialization_lib_bg.wasm -O --enable-mutable-globals; wasm-pack pack; cd .. && npm run js:flowgen
scripts.js:prepublish: npm run rust:test && rimraf ./publish && cp -r ./rust/pkg ./publish && cp README.md publish/ && cp LICENSE publish/
scripts.js:publish-nodejs: npm run rust:build-nodejs && npm run js:prepublish && node ./scripts/publish-helper -nodejs && cd publish && npm publish --access public
scripts.js:publish-browser: npm run rust:build-browser && npm run js:prepublish && node ./scripts/publish-helper -browser && cd publish && npm publish --access public

hooks.pre-push: npm run rust:test && npm run rust:build-nodejs
